Introduction

Rise Nishikawa, best known as RiSe (리세), was a Japanese singer under Polaris Entertainment. She was the main dancer, vocalist, visual, and face of the girl group LADIES' CODE.

On September 7, 2014, RiSe, unfortunately, passed away due to a car accident.
